The Edward Lee Ebook Library (2014 Update) -emidius-

48 Books by a Master of Extreme Horror, Splatterspunk, and Bizarro Fiction (All Epub Format)

Edward Lee (born May 25, 1957) is an American novelist specializing in the field of horror who has written 40 books, more than half of which have been published by mass-market New York paperback companies such as Leisure/Dorchester, Berkley, and Zebra/Kensington. He is a Bram Stoker award nominee for his story Ã¢â‚¬Å“Mr. Torso,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ and his short stories have appeared in over a dozen mass-market anthologies, including the award-winning 999. Several of his novels have sold translation rights to Germany, Greece, Romania, and Poland. He also publishes quite actively in the small-press/limited-edition hardcover market; many of his books in this category have become collectorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s items. While a number of LeeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s projects have been optioned for film, only one has been made, Header, which was released on DVD in June 2009.
